title: SOLD - Turkey Red T3 Ty Cobb
author: mouschi

posts.post_title: SOLD - Turkey Red T3 Ty Cobb
posts.post_content:
1911 T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb – $SOLD net to me after fees/shipping. 

To me, this is the Mona Lisa of baseball cards :)  This has an Altered designation, because it appears as though a barely noticeable wrinkle running across the card was attempted to be fixed.  The colors are incredible.

[img]https://tanmanbaseballfan.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/t3front.jpg[/img] 

[img]https://tanmanbaseballfan.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/t3back.jpg[/img]
